articles.author: Matt Burgess, Dhruv Mehrotra
articles.title: China’s Hackers Keep Targeting US Water and Electricity Supplies
articles.description: Plus: Russia was likely behind widespread GPS outages, Vault 7 leaker was sentenced, police claim to trace Monero cryptocurrency, and more.
articles.content: An indictment from the US Department of Justice may have solved the mystery of how disgraced cryptocurrency exchange FTX lost over $400 million in crypto. The indictment, filed last week, alleges tha… [+3401 chars]
